ComicInfo.Title: The More We Give, The More We Have
ComicInfo.Summary:
He's annoying. He's dangerous. He smells terrible. But the public love him. That's right-the Merc with the Mouth may make money for missions of murky morality...but he's become the most popular hero in the world for it. Eat that, Spidey! The world belongs to...DEADPOOL. The fan favorite team of Gerry Duggan and Mike Hawthorne return to bring Deadpool in to his most successful adventures yet!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Tony Moore | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Kevin Wada | 2 | Var | Secret Comic Variant Cover | Gerry Duggan (a), Scott Koblish (a), Guru-eFX (c) & Joe Sabino (l) | 3 | Var | Marvel Hip-Hop Variant Cover | Mike Hawthorne | 4 | RE | Mile High Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | ? | 5 |

ComicInfo.Characters: Deadpool, Foolkiller (Salinger), Hawkeye, Madcap, Scott Adsit, Slapstick, Solo, Stingray, Terror Inc
